text: Absalom ya riga ya naɗa Amasa a kan sojoji a maimakon Yowab. Amasa kuwa ɗan wani mutum mai suna Itra ne,17.25 Da Ibraniyanci Yeter, wani sunan Yeter mutumin Ishmayel17.25 Ibraniyanci da waɗansu rubuce-rubucen hannu na Seftuwajin; sauran rubuce-rubucen hannu na Seftuwajin (dubi kuma 1Tar 2.17) mutumin Ishmayel Ko kuwa mutumin Yezireyel wanda ya auri Abigiyel,17.25 Da Ibraniyanci Abigiyel, wani sunan Abigiyel. ’yar Nahash, ’yar’uwar Zeruhiya mahaifiyar Yowab.
